alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 21 at 9:13PM MDT until October 22 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 5 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...West and southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern San Miguel County and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 5 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Miguel County; Northeast Highlands
